Name: Barton Special Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry and hardcore - gin, apple brandy and Scotch, tamed only by a little dilution and being chilled.
History: Thought to be named after the noted 'all American' advertising guru and political publicist, Bruce Fairchild Barton, who in 1919 co-founded the Barton, Durstine & Osborn advertising agency.
Nutrition: One serving of Barton Special Cocktail contains 204 calories
